page.title: 11Life in Colden Common 1.
page.content: The village has a very active social life and claims to have nearly 40 clubs and societies catering for all ages,ranging from the Playgroup to the Friendship Club for the Elderly.There is also a highly successful"twinning" scheme with the village of St.Vigor Le Grand in Normandy involving regular exchange visits.Almost 50% of the interviewees in a sample survey belonged to at least one village society. The Village Association coordinates many of the activities.It promotes social events such as dances,the summer fete,barbecues,etc. and,in so doing,helps to bring together the"old" and"new"villagers.The Association owns a minibus which regularly takes elderly residents to Eastleigh for shopping and daily picks up doctor's prescriptions for the housebound.
